changes: Resolved memory leak in webhook delivery system
Fixed incorrect status code returned for expired API tokens
New /v2/invoices/auto-charge endpoint for automatic payment collection
Support for cryptocurrency payments (BTC, ETH, USDC)
Optimized database queries for payment history endpoint
Reduced webhook delivery latency by 60%
Implemented stricter validation for merchant account creation
Added IP whitelisting support for API requests
Introduced /v2/payouts endpoints for marketplace platforms
Added support for instant payouts to debit cards
Fixed issue where declined payments weren't logging proper error details
Corrected rounding errors in currency conversion for JPY
Fixed webhook retry logic not respecting exponential backoff
New /v2/fraud/review endpoint for manual fraud review workflows
Added machine learning-based fraud scoring
The use_3ds parameter is deprecated in favor of authentication_method
Updated maximum file size for dispute evidence uploads to 10MB
Improved error messages for invalid payment method tokens
Support for ACH bank transfers in the US
New /v2/balance endpoint to check available funds
Resolved issue with idempotency keys not working for batch payments
Fixed timestamp precision loss in payment created events
New API versioning scheme with explicit version headers
Added GraphQL endpoint at /graphql
Breaking: All date fields now return ISO 8601 format with milliseconds
Breaking: Removed legacy_customer_id field from responses
Fixed GraphQL pagination cursor encoding issues
Resolved timezone inconsistencies in scheduled payment processing
Support for Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL) payment methods
New /v2/checkout/sessions for hosted checkout pages
Increased rate limit for webhook endpoints to 5000 per hour
Enhanced checkout session customization options
Real-time transaction monitoring dashboard API
Support for SEPA Direct Debit payments in Europe
Implemented PCI DSS 4.0 compliance measures
Fixed race condition in refund processing for high-volume merchants
Corrected webhook signature validation for URLs with query parameters
New /v2/terminal endpoints for point-of-sale integrations
Added support for tap-to-pay on iPhone
Improved customer object search with fuzzy matching
Updated SDK documentation with more code examples
Support for recurring payment schedules with flexible intervals
New /v2/tax/calculate endpoint for automated tax calculation
Resolved issue with subscription cancellation webhooks not firing
Fixed decimal precision in tax calculation for Canadian GST
Introduced payment links for no-code payment collection
Added biometric authentication support for mobile SDKs
The /v1 API will be fully deprecated on July 1, 2026
Fixed payment link expiration not respecting custom durations
Corrected validation error for phone numbers with country codes

Support for digital wallets (PayPal, Venmo, Cash App)

Improved API response times by optimizing internal caching

Resolved timeout errors on analytics queries with large date ranges
